project_desc: This project builds a backend for an ecommerce application. It is connected through the MySql database and contains different products by categories, etc.

A social network api project that allows you to add users to the database add friends reactions and thoughts and you can also create a friends list and freinds can share their thoughts and their reactions.
This is a command line application that generates a README file for any project/application.
This project builds a backend for an ecommerce application. It is connected through the MySql database and contains different products by categories, etc.
